metadata.Title: CVE-2018-2585 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Vulnerability in the MySQL Connectors component of Oracle MySQL (subcomponent: Connector/Net). Supported versions that are affected are 6.9.9 and prior and 6.10.4 and prior. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows unauthenticated attacker with network access via multiple protocols to compromise MySQL Connectors. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized ability to cause a hang or frequently repeatable crash (complete DOS) of MySQL Connectors. CVSS 3.0 Base Score 7.5 (Availability impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:N/I:N/A:H).

criterions.comment: mysql-connector-net: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
